testcase.name: test_create_exam
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_iteration41.py:181: in test_create_exam assert response.status_code == 200, f"Expected 200, got {response.status_code}: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Expected 200, got 422: {"detail":[{"type":"missing","loc":["body","title"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"school_id":"SCH-TEST-2026","name":"Test Exam 2f0d5d","type":"unit1","class_id":"test-class-1","start_date":"2026-01-20","end_date":"2026-01-25","max_marks":100},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"},{"type":"missing","loc":["body","subject"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"school_id":"SCH-TEST-2026","name":"Test Exam 2f0d5d","type":"unit1","class_id":"test-class-1","start_date":"2026-01-20","end_date":"2026-01-25","max_marks":100},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"},{"type":"missing","loc":["body","duration"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"school_id":"SCH-TEST-2026","name":"Test Exam 2f0d5d","type":"unit1","class_id":"test-class-1","start_date":"2026-01-20","end_date":"2026-01-25","max_marks":100},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"},{"type":"missing","loc":["body","total_marks"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"school_id":"SCH-TEST-2026","name":"Test Exam 2f0d5d","type":"unit1","class_id":"test-class-1","start_date":"2026-01-20","end_date":"2026-01-25","max_marks":100},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"},{"type":"missing","loc":["body","questions"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"school_id":"SCH-TEST-2026","name":"Test Exam 2f0d5d","type":"unit1","class_id":"test-class-1","start_date":"2026-01-20","end_date":"2026-01-25","max_marks":100},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"}]} E assert 422 == 200 E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
